name: mozilla-youtube-dl-binding
author: Antoniy Chonkov
description: Watch flash videos from various sites using native player (like mpv) and youtube-dl.

preferences.name: player
preferences.title: Native player location
preferences.description: Specify native player executable full path

preferences.name: hotkey
preferences.title: Hotkey
preferences.description: Specify hotkey binding to start the player for current page

preferences.name: params
preferences.title: Additional player parameters
preferences.description: Specify additional parameters to pass the native player when started. Leave empty if none are required.
